data.message:
I don't know how but i wouldn't want to get out of this
Got a few things that were bent but you always go for a twist
Someone used to tell me that it's all in the wrist
There's a story unfolding before me, i went after it coldly 
Boldly supposed to be a real person whole mission statement
is to get me away from being myself, they sit there like devils against angels, i've got more to tell. Listen to what is being revealed, you understand that i don't appeal. But it doesn't matter what you feel.
If you've got something to say promise me it's real.
I just wanted to make you witness the storm
I'm sitting out of bounds i'm the hive mind from the swarm
A still alive mine-field ready and reborn
Don't walk across it or you'll wake up in your dorm
And i'm just about to get you to stop sleeping on the set
We record
